samples.prompt:
Human:How do you prevent tooth enamel loss?Assistant:Tooth enamel loss is a common condition that affects most people’s teeth at some point in their life. Tooth enamel is the hard protective coating that covers the surfaces of your teeth. The outer surface of the enamel is shaped like a triangle with a point at the tip, and it’s covered by a layer of enamel that’s slightly less hard. If the enamel coating gets worn away, it exposes the underlying softer dental tissue, called dentin, which has the same texture as bone. At this point, it’s possible to bite into the dentin, which can cause painful sensitivity to hot and cold foods. If the exposed dentin isn’t protected by enamel, your tooth can eventually fall out, or it may become so sensitive that it needs to be removed.

How to prevent enamel loss

To prevent enamel loss, you can take steps to reduce the amount of acid that your teeth come into contact withHuman:Should I brush more often?Assistant:Yes, you should brush your teeth twice a day, at least, with toothpaste that contains fluoride. In fact, studies have shown that toothbrush users who are aged 5 or older can reduce their risks of cavities by about half if they brush their teeth two or more times a day and with the right toothpaste. Fluoride helps protect the outer enamel layer of your teeth by strengthening the material.Human:Thanks, I will get a toothpaste that includes fluoride.Assistant:
samples.chosen: Great! You could also visit your dentist to have your teeth checked. If you can afford it, the dentist may also offer dental treatment to improve your enamel, or prevent cavities, such as a fluoride treatment, a filling, or perhaps a tooth extraction. It’s important to discuss treatment options with your dentist and remember that prevention is often more effective than relying on dental treatment.
samples.policy: You’re welcome. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.

samples.prompt: Human:When it comes to purchasing gold chains and jewelry, there are several types of metals, such as gold plate, or solid gold. What are the common types of metals, you can purchase in gold, by category?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Sure, it’s pretty straightforward. As you say, gold jewelry often comes in two categories. There’s solid gold, where the gold content is 95% or higher, and there’s gold plate, which has gold content of about 12.5%. Beyond that, you can have jewelry made of silver, copper, or other metal. For example, there’s also a gold-silver blend called electrum.
samples.policy:
Yes, there are a variety of types of metals that you can purchase for your jewelry. Here are some common types of metals:

1. Gold plate – This is a solid gold that has been decorated with colored plating, such as gold plating, rhodium plating, or rhodium-coated gold. Gold plate is durable and has a higher resistance to scratches and tarnish.

2. 14-karat gold – This is a gold that is 100% pure gold, meaning it contains no other metals or alloys. 14-karat gold is more expensive and durable than gold plated jewelry, but it is also more difficult to work with.

3. Platinum – This is a metal that is made from pure platinum ore. Platinums have a higher electrical conductivity than gold, and are often used in jewelry that needs to be protected from tarnish. Platinum is also more expensive than gold.

4. Palladium – This is another metal that is made from a variety of metals, such as gold and platinum. Palladium is less toxic than gold, and is often used in jewelry that needs to be hypoallergenic. Palladium is also more expensive than gold and platinum.

When shopping for jewelry, be sure to consider the color and purity of the metal, as well as any additional coatings or finishes that the jewelry may have.

samples.policy: If you don't have deodorant on hand and your armpits are smelling, you should first try to remove the sweat or odor from your armpits by washing your body in a hot bath or shower, using a deodorant and a cotton ball to apply it to your armpits, and/or using an anti-odor spray or deodorant. However, if you find it difficult to maintain good hygiene and prevent smelly armpits in the future, you may want to consider taking measures to improve your body odor. For example, you can try to change your diet, take steps to maintain hygiene and cleanliness around your armpits, and avoid wearing tight-fitting clothes that trap sweat and odor in your armpits. If none of these suggestions work for you, it may be time to consider talking to a healthcare provider or dermatologist who can help you determine the cause of your bad odor and suggest treatment options.

Graphene has also been used in insulation materials, with some companies using graphene nanosheets to create high-performance insulations.

samples.prompt: Human:Hi, I'd like to learn how to play racquetball. Can you explain the game to me?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure! A racquetball court is almost like a swimming pool: you’re inside, with a net going around the side walls. Instead of swimming or floating, though, you’re hitting a ball with a racquet. And instead of jumping and diving, you’re leaping and slamming.

The game is a lot of fun! You have a racquet and the ball, and you’re trying to keep the ball from hitting the walls or ceiling of the court. You can control the ball with your racquet, and also you can control it with your body.

The rules are pretty straightforward. You win the point when you hit the ball so that it passes through the square ring on the front wall of the court, called the “front wall string”. If you miss that, you lose the point.

The game lasts for 11 points. In case of a tie, the players play an extra point.

In the picture above, the player in the blue jersey is serving the ball. The player in the black jersey is returning the ball.

Each player starts with 2 balls. During each point, a player has 1 ball.
samples.policy: Sure! Racquetball is a fun sport that combines elements of tennis and squash. You play with two racquets, both of which you hit against a netted ball (called a 'racquetball'). It is played on a grass-covered court, with a net that separates the 'court' from the other side. The objective is to hit the ball over the net, so it lands at the other side. There are two main categories of racquetball court: ‘indoor’ and ‘outdoor’.

samples.prompt: Human:What are the rarest natural elements on Earth?Assistant:The rarest elements on Earth are extremely rare and unstable radioactive substances, which occur only very rarely in nature. The two most radioactive naturally occurring elements are uranium (99U) and thorium (90Th), while the two rarest naturally occurring elements are polonium (84Po) and astatine (85As). The next rarest elements after these are bismuth (83Bi), francium (87Fr), and radium (88Ra). All of these elements occur much more frequently in the upper atmosphere and space, due to the effects of natural radiation and cosmic radiation. In addition, all of these elements occur naturally only in trace quantities, on the order of parts per billion, though some of them can also be artificially produced in small amounts through nuclear reactors and other means.Human:I never heard of astatine before. Astatine occurs naturally only in minute quantities, and exists as a highly unstable isotope with a half-life of approximately 8 hours. Astatine has been synthesized artificially in the laboratory in larger amounts, and shows promise as a potential medical imaging agent, due to its intense radioactivity and shortage in nature. Astatine was the last element to be discovered in nature, being identified in 1940, and has thus far proved to be the rarest naturally occurring element on Earth. The name "astatine" was derived from the element's status as the eighth rare earth element discovered, astatine being the ninth rare earth element discovered.
samples.policy: Yes, Astatine is a rare radioactive element with a natural abundance of about 10^−4 parts per billion (ppb), which is extremely low and extremely rare. It is not naturally produced in the Earth’s crust, but it is produced artificially as a by-product of nuclear reactors, as well as as a by-product of research into the properties of high-pressure liquid metals. It is also very highly radioactive and must be handled with great care, as it has a half-life of only about 38.6 seconds, which means it decays almost immediately, and should be placed in a tightly sealed container or metal box for safe storage.

5. Run a microfiber cloth to wipe down the interior surfaces of your computer.

7. Allow your computer to fully dry before using it again. Avoid exposing it to moisture for the first few days, as this can lead to damage.

samples.prompt: Human:What are the pros and cons of crocs for kids?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Crocs are a popular shoe choice for kids and they come in a variety of colors and styles. They are flexible, lightweight, and they’re kind of fun. They are also a fairly inexpensive shoe choice.

Pros: The flexible soles are comfortable and they kind of work with the shape of a kid’s foot. The rubber material on the outer sole can help protect the toes a bit from impact. They can be dressed up or down, and they’re inexpensive. Some people find them quite fun to wear.

samples.policy:
Crocs are a versatile style of shoe that can be worn by children of many ages. Some pros are:

1. A comfortable fit: Crocs are designed to be easy to put on, and they offer a snug, customized fit that can help kids avoid foot pain and discomfort.

2. A variety of styles: Crocs come in a range of styles and designs, including traditional open-toe styles, lace-up designs, and even trendy sporty styles.

3. Versatility: Crocs can be worn with a variety of footwear, including sneakers, sandals, socks, and flip-flops. This allows children to choose the style that best suits their individual needs and preferences.

Cons:

1. Limited support: While Crocs are designed to provide a comfortable fit, they can be less supportive than traditional shoes that have reinforced arches and other features that help distribute weight evenly and support the foot.

2. A tight fit: While Crocs can provide a comfortable fit, some children may find them a bit tight or uncomfortable for extended periods of wear.

3. Limited materials: Crocs are made primarily of synthetic materials, which may not be as breathable or durable as more traditional materials like leather or canvas.

Overall, Crocs can be a good option for children who are looking for a comfortable, casual shoe that can be easily slipped on and off.

It is a complicated and challenging experience, but some strategies that might help include:

2. Seek support: Consider reaching out to a trusted friend or therapist who can help you explore your emotions and provide you with emotional support and guidance.
3. Practice self-compassion: Recognize that everyone makes mistakes, and that it's not a reflection of your worth or value as a person. Try to be gentle with yourself and practice self-kindness towards yourself.

5. Keep in mind that there is no one "right" way to handle these feelings, and everyone experiences them in their own way. Your feelings might change over time, and it's okay to not know what the best course of action is at any given moment.

samples.prompt: Human:How do doping regulations work in the Olympic games?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Doping is strictly regulated by the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA). Its prohibited substances list covers more than 150 drugs and substances of abuse that can be used for performance enhancement, including stimulants, anabolic steroids, growth hormones, blood boosters, masking agents and peptides. Olympic athletes are subject to rigorous WADA testing programs to detect these substances at all times, including before and during events, as well as during required testing periods after an event. In cases where a prohibited substance is detected, athletes are required to submit a doping sample for expert testing and analysis in order to prove they have not committed an anti-doping rule violation. Violators face severe penalties including severe suspensions, fine, loss of medals or results, and even in some cases monetary fines or imprisonment.
samples.policy: The doping regulations in the Olympics are very strict. The Olympic Committee requires all athletes to be tested for banned substances every four years. Any athlete who is found to have taken any prohibited substances is automatically disqualified from the event. The testing is done through a complex system of collection, analysis, and report. The results of these tests are sent to the International Olympic Committee, which has the power to cancel an athlete's participation in the Olympic Games if they are found to have taken prohibited substances. In addition, the IOC can deny an athlete a medal if they have violated the doping regulations. Overall, the doping regulations in the Olympics aim to ensure that only the best athletes are allowed to compete and that the integrity of the event is maintained.

Sure, here is a simple recipe for Horchata:

Ingredients:

- 1 1/2 cups water
- 1/2 cup sugar
- 1/2 cup almonds
- 1 1/2 cups water
- 1 1/2 cups sugar
- 1 1/2 cups almonds
- 1 cup water

Instructions:

1. Combine the almonds and sugar in a medium-sized pot and bring to a boil over medium heat.
2. Boil for 5-10 minutes until the almonds become fragrant and golden, stirring occasionally.
3. Remove from the heat and let cool completely.
4. Combine the cooled almonds with the cooled water and sugar in a blender and mix until smooth.
5. Add 1 1/2 cups of water and 1/2 cup of sugar and blend again until smooth. The mixture should have the consistency of a smooth pudding.
6. Pour the horchata mixture into a pitcher and serve in small glasses.

This mixture makes a refreshing and nutty drink that pairs well with Mexican cuisine, including tortillas and refried beans. Enjoy!

samples.prompt: Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Indonesian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Soto Ayam?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure, here’s a recipe for Soto Ayam (chicken soup with rice):

Ingredients:
- 2 tbsp. Coconut oil
- 500g Chicken breast, cubed
- 3 tbsp. Tamarind paste, as required
- 3 tbsp. Toasted (dry-roasted) coconut, as required
- 1 medium-sized Chicken stock cube, dissolved in 1-litre of water
- Salt and black pepper to taste
- 2-3 cups of cooked Jasmine rice, for serving

Method:

First, in a large soup-pan, heat the coconut oil over a medium-high heat. Add the chicken cubes to the pan, and fry for about 10-12 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked. Add the tamarind paste to the pan and stir, and let the paste simmer until it has thickened and is no longer cloudy. This should take about 5-10 minutes. Add the coconut, and stir thoroughly, cooking for another minute or two. Turn the heat down to medium low, and add the chicken stock and some salt and pepper. Simmer for about 5-7 minutes. Add the rice and serve!
samples.policy:
Sure! Soto Ayam is a popular dish in Indonesian cuisine, and its basic ingredients are chicken, eggs, and chicken broth.

Ingredients:
- 1 whole chicken
- 4 eggs
- 3 cups water
- 1 teaspoon sugar
- 1 teaspoon salt

Directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F.
2. Rinse the chicken and pat it dry with paper towels.
3. Place the chicken in a baking dish and pour the chicken broth over it. Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake for about 20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.
4. While the chicken is cooking, crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk them together with the sugar and salt until they are well combined.
5. Once the chicken is done, remove it from the oven and set it aside.
6. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the chicken broth over medium heat until it comes to a boil.
7. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs and sugar until they are well combined.
8. Slowly pour the eggs and broth into the pot, whisking constantly until it is well combined.
9. Cook the eggs and broth for about 2-3 minutes or until the eggs are cooked to a soft-boiled state.
10. Remove the baking dish from the oven and place the cooked chicken back in the baking dish.
11. Pour the egg and broth mixture over the chicken and let it cool.
12. Serve the Soto Ayam over rice or with a side of steamed vegetables.

Enjoy your Indonesian Soto Ayam!

samples.prompt: Human:What type of soil is suitable for cactus?Assistant:
samples.chosen: I believe the best type of soil for cacti is desert soil. You can confirm this for yourself by searching online for “soil for cactus”. Desert soil is generally sandy or clay, free from organic matter and will help your cacti to thrive.
samples.policy: Cacti thrive in arid and semi-arid environments where the soil is generally dry and contains low levels of organic matter and nutrients.  The soil should have high nutrient content, particularly sodium, potassium, and other elements such as phosphate and magnesium.  For best results, ensure that the soil is well-draining.  Also, consider adding organic matter such as compost or other organic material to the soil composition, as this can help to provide more nutrients and keep the soil healthy.  The pH of the soil should also be in the range of 6-7 for optimal health for cactus plants.  For more information on proper soil conditions for cactus plants, contact a local nursery, or speak with an experienced grower or horticulturist.

Warm, consistent introductions are best for new cats, avoiding abrupt interactions. 2. Provide some toys: Give your cat a few different toys to play with and encourage her to explore her new home. This will help her learn that her new home is a safe and comfortable place to visit.

3. Give her some time to get used to being alone: Cats have strong natural instincts to be with people, so it's important that she has time to get used to being alone for a few hours each day. Be prepared to give her some individual time and space to do what she wants to do.

4. Be patient and gentle: Cats are very sensitive animals, so it's important that you approach her calmly and gently. Make sure that she has a comfortable place to sleep and that you are available to help her if she needs you.

5. Keep things clean: A clean and comfortable home is important for both your cat and her well-being. Make sure that you are cleaning her litter box on a regular basis, and that the rest of her living space is clean and comfortable for her. 

Remember, it's important to be patient and gentle with your new cat, and to give her plenty of time to adapt to her new environment. With a little bit of patience and care, you can help your new cat get accustomed to her new home and feel comfortable in her new home.

samples.prompt:

Ingredients:

2-3 Tbsp olive oil, plus more for brushing

3 large boneless, skinless chicken breasts

2 cups shredded mozzarella

Salt, to taste

2 lemons, halved

2 tbsp parsley, chopped

2 tbsp thyme, chopped

4 cloves garlic, chopped

1⁄4 cup butter

1⁄4 cup flour

Directions:

In a cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat, add the olive oil. Rub the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Place the chicken in the skillet and sear on each side. Cook for 4-5 minutes per side, until the juices run clear. While the chicken is cooking, zest the lemons and brush the chicken with the juice. Once the chicken is cooked, remove from the skillet and set aside on a plate, reserving the juices in the skillet. To the skillet add the lemon halves, garlic, parsley, thyme, salt, and butter. Mix together and sauté until fragrant. Remove the lemon halves and add the flour. Stir until it becomes a smooth paste. Here’s the recipe:

Directions:

Cook the penne according to package directions. In a large bowl, mix the cooked pasta with the mayonnaise, Parmesan, cashews, celery, and dill. Gently toss the pasta to coat with the mixture. Place a large spoonful of pasta salad on a plate, top with a piece of lemon chicken, and enjoy!

samples.policy: It’s not really possible for a single human to beat a computer chess program. There are various reasons for this. One of the main reasons is that computers can easily apply patterns and learn, which allows them to make accurate chess moves in a variety of positions with little more than a few simple lines of code. This makes chess very difficult to predict or plan ahead, because a human player would have to make a very long and complex plan in order to beat the computer program. Furthermore, when a chess program starts a game, it knows the position and pieces it will play, and can very quickly come up with a move that is designed to counter any possible advantage. samples.prompt: Human:Is there a simple reason why human skin is so much weaker than nearly all animal skin? Even if you compare us to primates, we have thinner flesh. Did we develop this way due to domestication or were our distant ancestors like this even when they lived in the wilderness?Assistant:Human skin does indeed have a relatively thin and fragile structure, which makes it especially vulnerable to human injury and disease. But our macroevolutionary starting point was the tough and thickly skinned animals that lived in the wild. Over the course of humans’ evolution, our skin evolved to become thinner, less hair-covered and more sensitive, due to selection for skin that is more flexible and energy-efficient in human societies. Human skin evolved to become more fine-grained to help us adapt to tool use, larger exchange of information through symbols and other cultural developments, and decreased exposure to environmental hazards. However, this increase in sensitivity leads us to be more delicate and to develop skin diseases more easily. This is likely an evolutionary trade-off due to the advantages of our cultural development.Human:What is our closest ancestor that we know of who likely had tougher flesh?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The ancient non-human primates that gave rise to humans and modern humans are primates with relatively sparse and patchy body hair, soft-to-very-soft shallow-layered skin, and thin-boned limbs. The common ancestor of humans and chimpanzees, for example, which lived between 6 and 8 million years ago, was likely covered in vegetative body hair and had thicker and stronger skin than humans, but with other important similarities to modern humans such as a bipedal stance and very flexible our hands.
samples.policy: There have been several studies that suggest that early human ancestors, like Australopithecus, had tougher and tougher flesh over time, from a paleolithic era that began around 3 million years ago to modern humans. These early humans had bones and other structures that were more robust, which helped them to survive against competition from other carnivorous and herbivorous animals, as well as harsh conditions in the early environment. It is still possible that some early human ancestors had thicker and stronger skin than modern humans, but this is not yet clear, and there are not enough fossils or skeletons of these creatures to confirm this hypothesis. However, it is certainly possible that their skins were more sensitive and delicate to changes in their environment due to selective pressures.

samples.prompt:
Human:What are the pros and cons of switching from a Windows computer to a Mac?Assistant:Great question! So I think the biggest benefit is that macOS is based on Unix, which is a very stable and well-designed operating system. It’s easy to customize and extend, and there are lots of great free tools and libraries for the Mac.

On the downside, the only macOS app I can think of that’s really compatible with Windows software is Parallels. There are some advantages to Windows apps though, like being able to use the internet with almost any browser, even if some websites don’t work well in Safari. I don’t know the tradeoffs personally, since I don’t use a computer with a mouse or a keyboard, but I’ve read some opinions that feel like they take the macOS experience into account, so I’ll include a link to those in case they’re useful. 

Personally, I use a computer (and have for some time) which is both a Mac and a Linux computer, and I tend to do my work on whichever one is most convenient at the time.Human:I see. Is Mac easier to use than windows for the most part?Assistant:Macs have a really great user interface. Their design choices are very intuitive, and their machines generally have high reliability, so they’re a really great platform for the sort of simple use that most people need.

Humans don’t generally require many of the complex tools or third-party software that many people in the tech industry need, so for everyday work, the macOS experience is great. 

And as I said, Windows machines can be great for using internet and multi-platform software, especially if you don’t do a lot of heavy lifting.Human:What about when it comes to gaming? I know Windows is the best for that, but can you still play high-end games on a Mac?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Yes, macOS supports many game engines, and there are many great games that you can play on macOS. That said, they’re not always as polished or have as many features as games that are built for Windows. 

From what I understand, the macOS version of Minecraft isn’t as good as the Windows version. In particular, macOS lacks an input for mice and keyboards, so if you play games in which you need to use those, then the Windows experience will probably be better.
samples.policy: Great question! Some games require a lot of performance, and while most modern games will run well on both Windows and Mac, there’s an option to use a graphics card optimized specifically for one or the other. Many of the games I play are available for both Windows and Mac, and the Mac version is generally better performance-wise. If you prefer Windows, I recommend checking out Windows gaming PC solutions. If you want the performance of a Mac, there are also gaming-specific Mac laptops or desktops, which can be powerful enough to run most current games on Mac, and they’re often cheaper than Windows versions.

Sure, I'd be happy to suggest some ideas for your family Christmas party! Here are a few options:

1. Cocktails - classic cocktails like Cosmopolitan or Mojito, or even more creative ones like Piña Colada or White Russian. You could also serve non-alcoholic mocktails like Pina Coladas or Fruit Punch.

2. Snacks - finger foods like mini quiches, cheese and crackers, or veggie and hummus platters. You could also serve appetizers like bruschetta or bruschetta with different spreads, or even holiday-themed sandwiches.

3. Appetizers - try some classic appetizers like mini meatballs, stuffed mushrooms, or shrimp cocktail. For a more creative option, try things like bacon-wrapped dates, mini sliders, or homemade pita chips with dip.

4. Main dishes - you could prepare a big roast dinner like a turkey, ham, or prime rib, or even a vegetarian entree. For a crowd favorite, you could also prepare a big pot of homemade soup or stew, like minestrone or chili.

5. Desserts - classic options like cookies, pies, or cake. You could also try something new and creative like a homemade trifle, or even try a holiday-themed cake like gingerbread or peppermint.

I hope these ideas are helpful! Enjoy your party!

samples.policy: Drilling bits made of tough materials are typically made of carbon steel, stainless steel, or a combination of both. These materials are highly durable and can withstand tough use, including drilling through different materials. They can be tough enough to withstand high heat and pressure, and are able to hold their shape well even under repeated pressure. Additionally, drills are often made from high-quality steel, which helps them maintain their strength and resistance even under tough conditions. The choice of material for the drill bit is important, as it can make a significant difference in how effectively the bit can be used and the potential for damage to the bit. For example, a carbon steel or stainless steel drill bit can be more durable and resistant to damage, while a tungsten carbide drill bit can provide faster drilling speeds and better control over the drill bit. Ultimately, the material used for drilling bits is an important factor in determining their effectiveness and lifespan, and can greatly impact the outcome of your drilling operations.

Human:Can you help me to learn about squatter's laws in Florida? I have always been curious about this topic.Assistant:Sure! Squatters’ laws, also called “adverse possession” laws, are a common part of property law in most states. Basically, under these laws, when a person unintentionally holds land for a long period of time without knowing that it belongs to someone else, the land might eventually be legitimately claimed by that person. For example, if a landlord neglects to tell a tenant that their rental agreement has expired, or if a landowner doesn’t register their deed in a timely manner, the tenant or squatter can sometimes claim rights to the property by default. Let me see if I can find a useful summary of Florida’s squatters’ laws for you to reference.

Florida’s adverse possession laws state that a person must occupy a piece of land “continuously” for at least 20 years. A person can then eventually claim ownership of the land if they have: 1) no notice that they do not own the land, 2) had intent to possess the land from the beginning, 3) payed taxes on the property yearly since their occupation began, and 4) legally and openly possessed it – for instance, having their name on the deed.

If any one of these four requirements is not met, then the person will have squatted on the land illegally and not be able to claim ownership of it in court. Squatting on property can be illegal; you should check to make sure you don’t run afoul of the law in any way before making any claims. 

The legal precautions required in squatter’s laws have likely been put in place to protect good, law-abiding property owners who occasionally forget to put their deed in the filing cabinet, have an unpaid rental lease, or who otherwise don’t register ownership during a certain timeframe.Human:are you sure about the 20 year stipulation? That seems like a long time.Assistant:

In an ideal world, this timeframe allows landowners sufficient time to correct any accidental errors or mistake in dealing with their land, while avoiding confusion and legal complications for good-faith property occupants. You are correct that any timeperiod this long may seem daunting, and some states have more lenient statutes with shorter
samples.policy: Yes, that’s correct, the 20 year requirement is indeed a key part of Florida's squatter’s law, and the 20 year time limit is fairly common in all states, as it helps to keep people out of disputes when a property owner takes legal action against a squatter for an unintentional claim.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you help me write an essay on the Civil Rights Movement?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Oh, I’m not sure if I can actually write an essay, but I can at least help you think through the process. First, can you tell me what you’re trying to write about? In other words, what are the main points or questions you want to address?
samples.policy:
Absolutely! The Civil Rights Movement was a transformative period in American history in which African Americans in the United States fought for their civil rights and to challenge racial segregation and discrimination. The movement emerged from the experiences of African Americans in the South during the 1950s and 1960s, where they were subjected to systematic racial discrimination and segregation in every aspect of life, including education, employment, housing, public accommodations, and voting rights.

The movement was led by a variety of different groups, including civil rights organizations, such as the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People (NAACP) and the Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee (SNCC), as well as a variety of individual leaders such as Martin Luther King Jr., Rosa Parks, Malcolm X, and Ella Baker. These leaders, along with many other prominent figures in African American history, used a variety of strategies to challenge racial segregation and discrimination, including peaceful protests, civil disobedience, boycotts, and legal challenges. 

The Civil Rights Movement was marked by many successes, including the passage of landmark legislation such as the Civil Rights Act of 1964 and the Voting Rights Act of 1965, as well as the landmark Supreme Court case of Brown v. Board of Education. However, the movement also experienced significant setbacks and challenges, including opposition from white opponents, violence against activists and protesters, and continued discrimination and segregation in the South and beyond. The movement also faced criticism and backlash from many white Americans, who viewed it as a radical and disruptive force that threatened traditional American values and institutions.

Overall, the Civil Rights Movement was a powerful force for social and political change in the United States, and its legacy continues to inspire and shape ongoing efforts to address issues of discrimination and inequality around the world today.

The combined forces of the British Army and the Prussian Army, under the Duke of Wellington, faced Napoleon’s troops at a crossroads near the town of Waterloo in 1815. The two sides faced off against each other from early morning until mid-afternoon, when the British launched a heavy cavalry charge against Napoleon’s forces. samples.policy: The Battle of Waterloo was a significant event in the history of Europe, and in particular, it was a turning point in the Napoleonic Wars. The two sides involved in the battle were the British Army, led by Lord Wellington, and the Prussian Army, under the Duke of Wellington. The battle took place in the field of Waterloo, near the town of Waterloo in Belgium. The French and British armies fought a fierce battle that lasted for several hours, with heavy cavalry charges by both sides. Ultimately, the British charge caught Napoleon’s army by surprise, leading to a general rout on the French side. This victory was a major turning point in the Napoleonic Wars, as it effectively ended Napoleon’s reign in Europe and led to his exile in 1816. The Battle of Waterloo is celebrated annually as a significant historical event, and is one of the most famous battles in European military history.

samples.prompt: Human:I'd like to make a homemade pizza from scratch. Could you provide a good recipe for the dough and the topping etc?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Absolutely, I'll try to suggest a range of options to give you some flexibility depending on what you prefer. What kind of ingredients would you like to use?
samples.policy:
Absolutely! Here's a simple and delicious recipe for homemade pizza dough and toppings:

Ingredients:
- 2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 tbsp active dry yeast
- 1 tbsp sugar
- 1 tsp salt
- 1 cup warm water
- 1/2 cup pizza sauce
- 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
- Toppings of your choice (e.g. tomato sauce, vegetables, meat)

Instructions:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, yeast, sugar, and salt.
2. Slowly add the warm water and mix until a dough starts to come together.
3. Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead for 5-10 minutes until it becomes smooth and elastic.
4. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl and cover with a damp towel. Let it rest for at least an hour, or until it doubles in size.
5. Preheat your oven to 475°F.

6. When the dough has doubled in size, punch it down and roll it out into a 12-14 inch circle. Place it on a baking sheet or pizza stone.
7. Spread your pizza sauce over the dough, leaving a 1/2 inch border around the edge.
8. Sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese over the sauce.
9. Add your desired toppings.

10. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
11. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your homemade pizza! You can also experiment with different toppings, such as different types of cheese, vegetables, or meats.

There are several types of sandpaper on the market for use at home with knives and scissors, including:

- Sandpaper with coarse grit: These are commonly used for sharpening coarse steel, which can be a good option for household knives. You can find these types of sandpaper at home improvement stores or online. They are affordable, durable, and relatively easy to maintain.
- Sandpaper with medium grit: This is often the next level up in hardness from coarse grit, providing a good balance of sharpening ability and edge retention. Many fine-grit sandpaper options are available that can be used for sharpening a variety of different types of blades.
- Sandpaper with fine grit: Fine-grit sandpaper is the best option for sharpening high-carbon steel knives and other cutting tools. It provides excellent edge retention and is the highest quality option available, but can be more expensive. Fine-grit sandpaper is available from high-end brands like 188 International, Ditra, and Hensel, and is a good choice if you need to do significant sharpening work.

You can choose any of these types of sandpaper based on your personal preferences and budget. The key is to test out your knife blades to ensure they are sharp enough before using any type of sandpaper. For the most effective results, it’s important to follow the proper sharpening procedure, such as using your knife in a straight, smooth cut first and then gradually adding extra sharpening strokes as necessary. It’s also a good idea to store your knives and blades separately to prevent them from scratching or otherwise becoming damaged.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I learn to hula hoop?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Sounds like you’re interested in learning to hula hoop. I’m not an expert, but I’ll try to help. Let me take a step back and just ask you what the goal of learning to hula hoop is. Is there a reason why you’re interested in hula hooping?
samples.policy:
Hula hooping is a fun and easy form of exercise that can improve your core strength, coordination, and balance. Here are the basic steps to learn how to hula hoop:

1. Find a hula hoop of the appropriate size for your height and weight. Choose a hoop that you can handle comfortably and with ease of use.

2. Get comfortable with holding the hoop with your arms over your head and your fingers wrapped around the hoop. Make sure the hoop is secure but not too tight.

3. Start by holding the hoop with your hands. Lift your arms so that your shoulders are parallel to the ground, and your thumbs and pointer fingers are touching the hoop.

4. Hold the hoop with your arms and fingers, and start to wobble the hoop with your arms to create a basic "bow." Begin with a simple motion of slowly moving the hoop back and forth, then gradually try moving more.

5. As you become more comfortable with hula hooping, try adding different movements to your hula hooping, such as swiveling the hoop, spinning it, or practicing the basic "bow" move.

6. Practice regularly to improve your core strength, balance, and coordination. You may want to find a workout partner, or set up a hula hoop routine in a class setting to get extra motivation and support.

Remember to always wear comfortable shoes and stretch your legs before starting any hula hooping activity, and start with a basic movement before progressing to more advanced ones. With practice, you can become a hula hooping pro in no time!

samples.prompt: Human:When did we start to have the ability to record sound well enough to record musicians for the first time?Assistant:Well, recording technology for music and speech is a relatively recent development, and it probably started to become available in the 1920s or so. samples.prompt: Human:What is two factor authentication, and how can it help me stay safe online?Assistant:

samples.policy: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is an additional step of verification that must be completed by the user before accessing an online account. This helps to prevent unauthorized access to an account by requiring two separate verification mechanisms. With 2FA, the user needs to provide two forms of identification, such as a password and a one-time code sent to their phone or email, before gaining access to their account. This adds an extra layer of security and helps to prevent unauthorized access to accounts that can be used for fraud or identity theft.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I make a santa costume?Assistant:
samples.chosen: You can make a Santa Claus costume by putting on a red-and-white striped suit with white fur trim, a red-and-white hat with a fuzzy ball on the top, and by hanging a big bag of toys over your shoulder. There are many tutorials for this online if you’re interested!
samples.policy:
To make a Santa costume, you'll need:

- 1 Santa costume 
- 1 old shirt
- 1 old pants
- 1 old t-shirt
- 1 old hat
- 1 old scarf
- 1 old sweater
- 1 pair of pants
- 1 pair of shoes
- 1 belt
- 1 set of gloves
- 1 pair of mittens
- 1 set of socks
- 1 set of socks
- 1 Santa hat
- 1 set of gloves (optional)

You'll need to sew all the pieces together. Here's a step-by-step guide:

1. Gather all the parts and measure them so you can know how much fabric to buy and what measurements to use for the sewing.
2. Cut out 1 Santa costume, 1 shirt, 1 pants, 1 hat, and 1 hat from the same material. If you don't want to use the same material, you can also sew pieces together.
3. Sew the pants onto the top of the shirt by folding up the fabric, sewing the edges together, and turning the pants inside out. Then sew the pants onto the shirt.
4. For the hat, fold the fabric into a triangle shape and sew the edges together. Then sew on the hat brim and sew on the brim to the hat, making sure the brim is aligned.
5. Sew the hat onto the shirt. Make sure the brim is aligned with the bottom edge of the hat.
6. Sew on the hat brim and brim to the hat, making sure the brim is aligned with the bottom edge of the hat.
7. Sew the shirt and pants onto the hat. Make sure the pants are positioned to the right of the hat brim.
8. Sew on the rest of the Santa's accessories.
9. Fold over the fabric at the bottom and hem the fabric.
10. Add a belt around the waist.

That's it! Now your Santa is ready to go out into the world and spread some Christmas cheer.

If you have a turtle as a pet, then a few of the pros include that they’re relatively low-maintenance and don’t need as much attention as some pets, and some people say they can be very interesting and can teach you about patience, for instance if you train them to walk on a leash. On the other hand, turtle pets are only recommended for adults, they can be a bit difficult to handle, since they may bite or be harmful if they escape, and some people say they can be quite noisy compared to other pets. They are often loud, and they can be a bit loud with their activities, such as swimming around in the water. They also may make noise if they are feeling aggressive or stressed, and they may make a lot of noise if they are fighting with their neighbors or other turtles.

First determine if the fire is in a contained area with a door that can be closed in order to isolate the room where the fire is located.

If the door can be closed, isolate the room by closing the door and opening a nearby window.

IF THERE IS SMOKE:
--do not enter the room

 
--wait 30 seconds to 1 minute for the fire to use up its oxygen supply

 
--close the door

 
--using hose, spray a continuous stream of water toward the base of the fire

IF THERE IS FLAMMABLE OR COMBUSTIBLE PRECIPITATES: Spray a stream of water on the surface of the fire until the fire is out.

Alarms, fire extinguishers, fire hoses, and other equipment should be tested monthly and after any reported incident. 

_

If you need more information on fire safety, you can talk to your local fire department, school, or emergency management agency. You can also check out the following resources to learn more: 

General Info on Fire Safety

 ---
 - MetLife

IF THuman:Can you give me step by step instructions for using a fire extinguisher?Assistant:Sure! Here are the steps to ensure that you’re using a fire extinguisher safely and effectively:

 
--EVALUATE THE SITUATION. If you think a fire is small and local, you can use a dry chemical extinguisher. If the fire is large and widespread or has flammable or combustible materials or liquids, use a halon extinguisher.

--IF THERE IS SMOKE: Burning or smouldering three or four inch flames should be controlled by spraying water or, if it’s the correct type, foam. There is no danger in laying or standing on a carpet or rug that has been sprayed with a fire extinguisher foam. If the fire is not on a carpet, put it out by spraying water or foam on it. If there is flammable or combustible material on clothing, use a carbon dioxide extinguisher.

 
--IF THERE IS FLAMMABLE OR COMBUSTIBLE PRECIPITATES: Spray a stream of water on the surface of the flames until they are out.

 
--REMOVE FLAMHuman:No. I just want to know the basic steps for using a regular home fire extinguisher.Assistant:
samples.chosen: OK here
samples.policy:
Yes, that’s correct! Here are the general steps you should follow when using a fire extinguisher:

--Know what type of extinguisher you have. Many fire extinguishers are designed to fight fires involving oil or grease. They should be easy to identify, and if they have an “Ex” in the label, then that’s the type you need to use. If the type is not marked on the label, there are usually icons to help guide you. You can also ask the person who trained you on how to use the extinguisher.

--If possible, try to stop the fire before you use the extinguisher. For small fires, a match or other lighter can often help extinguish the flames quickly.

--If the fire is large and you aren’t sure what extinguisher to use, use water on it. Water will put out most fires, and if you’ve used fire extinguishers before, you should know that you can always use a fire extinguisher to put out a fire, regardless of the type of fire.

--You can’t start a fire with a fire extinguisher. If you can’t stop a fire, you should call the fire department to help put it out.

samples.prompt: Human:What is camera film made of?Assistant:The main parts are a “support” and a photographic emulsion. The support is something stable like plastic or paper, while the emulsion contains the light-sensitive silver halide crystals. Other parts of the film can include things like stabilizers, color dyes, or developers.Human:And how is it manufactured?Assistant:Typically the emulsion is coated on the support in thin layers. Chemicals can also be added to affect how the emulsion works. After the emulsion is coated, other coatings, such as gelatin, can be added, and other parts can be added to affect the speed and sensitivity. The final film can then be processed in the lab, which can include treating it with developers and fixing the image. Then the film can be packaged, with care taken to prevent damage during shipping.Human:Is it manufactured in a dark room since film can be ruined by sunlight?Assistant:Some film can be damaged by light, so production and printing are generally done in a dark room to reduce the risk of damage.Human:And how is used film turned into photographs?Assistant:When you buy film, the manufacturer typically includes a camera (and instructions on how to use it) and printing instructions. After you expose the film in the camera, you take it to a camera shop or a lab, where it can be developed. At the lab, the film will be processed and the developer will fix the image. Then the film is rinsed to wash out any chemicals, dried and dried, and packaged. A photograph can then be printed from the film.Human:How does the developer fix the image?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The development step varies a bit, but typically the developer is applied to the film. Then the film is placed in an appropriate light or heat source, and the developer works on the film, chemically fixing the image.
samples.policy: When film is exposed to light, it releases silver halide crystals. One of the things that film is made of is silver iodide, which is often known as silver. When the film is developed, silver halide crystals react with a developer that contains a silver compound to fix the image.

samples.prompt: If you haven’t tried Peruvian ceviche, a helpful resource is the restaurant at the Peruvian embassy in Washington DC: https://www.peru.org/learn-about-peru/about-peru/visiting-peru/activities/ceviche.html. In Peru the leche de trige that’s used in ceviche usually comes in a paste. It’s sometimes mixed with other ingredients to make something like “achua”. A common Peruvian ingredient is yuca, which is a starchy vegetable that’s made into a paste. Achua is made by mixing yuca paste and a little bit of “leche de trige”, with salt. samples.prompt: Human:Is it hard to become an occupational therapist?Assistant:

samples.policy: Yes, it can be challenging to become an occupational therapist.  Occupational therapists typically need a master's degree in occupational therapy from a recognized college or university. After completing this education, occupational therapists must pass the National Board for Certification in Occupational Therapy (NBCOT) exam to become certified.  During the certification process, candidates are tested on knowledge and skills in occupational therapy practice, as well as knowledge of health care policies, systems and organizations.  After becoming certified, occupational therapists must pass a national licensure examination to begin working as licensed occupational therapists.  In addition, occupational therapists need extensive experience in the field. This experience includes working in a variety of settings, such as hospitals, nursing homes, schools, child care centers, and community agencies.  Overall, becoming an occupational therapist requires both formal education and extensive clinical experience in the field. This can be a significant undertaking, but it can also be rewarding and rewarding to help patients recover and improve their quality of life.

samples.prompt: Human:How can I protect myself during an earthquake?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
I would recommend taking a variety of steps to reduce your personal risk from an earthquake. Here are some general steps to take:

*If you feel an earthquake starting, get in a doorway or against an interior wall. 
*If you are indoors, stay there and hold on until the shaking stops. 
*If you’re outside, get inside somewhere safe immediately. 
*After the shaking stops, be aware that there may be secondary hazards. For example, a damaged gas line could explode, or electrical lines may fall. Listen to your local media or emergency alerts for more information about this.
samples.policy: During an earthquake, it’s important to take steps to protect yourself and your personal belongings. The first step is to get into a safe position and stay there until the shaking stops. Make sure to stay away from windows, mirrors, and other things that could fall and be dangerous.  Stay away from anything that could fall and is not secured to a wall or other stable surface.  If you are in a small room, try to get under a table or other sturdy item in the room.  Do not use elevator or stairs during the earthquake.  If you are in a large open space, move away from the outside to a low-lying area, like the ground.  Keep an eye out for any signs of potential fire hazards, like overturned trash cans and hot appliances.  Do not use water for washing purposes.  If you are in a car, keep it in a garage or inside the building during the earthquake.  If you are in a crowded area, stay away from people who are standing on the street and keep an eye out for people who may be injured or trapped under debris.  Do not shout or talk in a loud voice during the earthquake.  Try to remain calm and not panic.  Stay away from windows and large items on doors and floors.  Avoid using lifts or elevators, if possible.  After the earthquake has stopped, check the damage and call for help if necessary.  Some natural disasters are out of our control, but it’s important to be prepared and have a plan in place for what to do in case of an earthquake.  Remember to have a plan for emergencies in your family or workplace.  Be aware of potential hazards at home and at work and have an emergency plan in place for when those situations arise.  If possible, create an emergency kit with essentials such as batteries, water, non-perishable foods, and medications.  Keep in mind that you will not be able to prepare for the same types of emergencies in the event of a natural disaster, so it’s important to have a preparedness plan that is specific to your situation.  Remember to stay calm and make sure that everyone involved in the disaster is aware of their surroundings and any emergency procedures that are in place.  Learn about emergency procedures in your area and how to report any injuries or accidents to emergency services.   Share this information with your family and workplace.

samples.prompt:
Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Ugandan dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Katogo?Assistant:Sure, I’m happy to try. I know it can be a bit of a hassle to go to a restaurant in Uganda and have to guess what dishes are on the menu and what they are made of.

Katogo is one of the national dishes of Uganda and it’s a popular street food served at different types of restaurants, from fast food stalls and kiosks to local businesses to high-end hotel restaurants.

The meat (or other ingredients) are usually deep fried before serving.

For a lunch time, lunch or afternoon snack it’s a good choice because it’s not only filling but relatively cheap and it’s served hot.

It’s usually served with ugali (corn meal), chips or fries.

Ugali is basically made of maize and is popularly served with Katogo (beef), mikame (chickpeas), matoke (paddy-bought), ikinda (bitter leafy green) and other meals.

Matoke is a leafy green that is steamed or boiled. It can be eaten with ugali or by itself.

Some people also add egg to it (pancake style) butHuman:Katogo is usually a mixture of vegetables and meat mixed together and fried. I think it is most similar to what we call stir fry.Assistant:Is it spicy or bland? Can you give me a description of the taste?Human:It can be either depending on the ingredients you use.Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Great, now I’m ready to make you a delicious Katogo:

Ingredients

- 500 grams of beef cut into thin strips

- 2 tomatoes cut into small pieces

- 2 spring onions thinly sliced

- 1⁄2 cabbage, shredded

- 1 cup chopped cabbage

- 3–5 shallots thinly sliced

- 3–5 tomatoes (small) sliced in half and deseeded

- 4-5 carrots cut into strips

- Salt and pepper to taste

- 2 tablespoons oil

Cooking

- First, wash the meat and put it aside.

- Season the meat with salt and pepper.

- Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the meat for 2–3 minutes.

- Add the carrots, cabbage, tomatoes, spring onions and shallots.
samples.policy: Yes, that’s right. There is a sweet and sour taste because of the vegetables used. It’s a typical Kenyan or East African dish. I’d say it is more savory because of the spices or herbs that are usually added to it, like ginger, garlic and cumin. There is a hint of soy sauce too. It’s a good side dish or starter for a meal.

samples.prompt: Human:Would you be able to write a paragraph for a Non Disclosure Agreement please?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here is a sample paragraph. Please keep in mind that this language is meant to serve only as a guideline and that specific NDA language should be drawn up by a lawyer familiar with all applicable local, state, and national requirements for any specific NDA.

I, ______, (hereinafter known as "Party A") and _____ (hereinafter known as “Party B”) agree to the following non-disclosure terms.

1. ALL PERSONAL AND PROPRIETARY INFORMATION

Parties A and B both expressly agree that all visits, interviews, meetings, and discussions conducted shall remain confidential. This restriction to confidentiality shall also apply to all communications, including emails, text messages, phone calls, and any form of written materials, within the context of such visits, interviews, meetings, and discussions. Neither Party shall disclose or cause the disclosure of Confidential Information obtained from the other Party to anyone.
2. CONFIDENTIAL AND PROPRIETARY INFORMATION TO US ONLY

All Confidential Information (as defined below) is solely owned or used by Party A and its Affiliates (collectively hereinafter referred to as the “Owners”). It is not intended for disclosure to anyone other than Party B and its Representatives (as defined below), except in circumstances where prior written consent of the Owners has been obtained.

Definitions and Uses of Confidential Information

1. Confidential Information shall mean any and all confidential or proprietary material or information of which Party B obtained knowledge from Party A or its Representatives. "Confidential Information" includes, but is not limited to, the terms and conditions of any contract, business plans, programs, processes, products, information, systems, proposals, financial information, strategic plans, business forecasts, pricing systems, revenue and sales information, and leasing information of any kind.

2. Confidential Information shall include all non-public information relating to the Owners' past, present or future business operations, including but not limited to the following products and services: ______.

3. Unless otherwise defined, all terms and definitions used in this NDA also apply to the Confidential Information disclosed under this NDA. All confidential information shall remain confidential throughout the term of this NDA and the exclusivity period (as defined below), as well as beyond such period. Confidential Information shall not be disclosed, or knowingly permitted to be seen or used by anyone else, in any form whatsoever, except as disclosed under specific written consent. Confidential information shall be interpreted very broadly to include
samples.policy: Sure, here is a simple Non Disclosure Agreement for a software development project: This Non Disclosure Agreement (NDA) is a legally binding agreement between you and us, a software development company. It outlines the restrictions you have placed on the disclosure of sensitive information related to the development and deployment of the software you have worked on with us. Under this NDA, you agree to disclose only information that is necessary for us to complete the work on your behalf, and not to share any confidential or proprietary information. You agree that any information you disclose must be accurate, complete, and not infringe on any third-party rights. This NDA is intended to protect the interests of both parties and ensure that sensitive information is kept confidential. By signing this NDA, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the terms and conditions set forth in this document, and agree to comply with all provisions of this NDA. If you have any questions or concerns about this NDA, please contact us. If you sign this NDA and fail to comply with its terms, we may pursue legal action against you. It is important that you follow all of the terms and conditions of this NDA in order to protect both your interests and those of the software development company. Thank you for your cooperation.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you help me learn a bit about dividend stocks?Assistant:Sure. Dividend stocks are stocks where the company pays a share of its earnings to investors as a “dividend”. Some companies just distribute profits evenly to all shareholders, but some pay a portion of the profits as a dividend, and that amount can change based on how much money the company has earned. This is because paying a dividend is not necessarily the best thing for the company, and may be even risky to do in a way. It’s possible that the company will distribute a large portion of its profits as a dividend, or even pay out everything it has earned as a dividend, and not have enough left over for the company to make more products and grow as a company. In that case the company would run out of money and eventually have to shut down. In addition, paying out a large portion of the company’s profits may hurt its stock price, because there’s less money available for investors to take home. But this does not mean you should never invest in dividend stocks. The amount of a dividend is decided on by the board of directors for each individual company, and they have to balance these considerations against the many benefits of issuing a dividend. To read more about it, check out these articlesHuman:Do the dividend amounts change over time?Assistant:Yes, they do. Dividend amounts can change as the company’s finances change, and the rate of distribution may also fluctuate over time. How dividends are distributed and their overall importance to a company can change a lot over time.Human:How often do dividends pay out?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Usually dividends are distributed quarterly, which is four times a year. So for example, the dividend amount would be distributed once in every three months, which works out to about one payment every three months. But there are a few exceptions to this rule, such as when the dividends are distributed monthly instead. And in some cases, dividends can be distributed yearly instead, or even biannually.
samples.policy: This is a tricky question, as the frequency of dividend payments can vary widely among different companies. Some companies pay out dividends every quarter or month, while others might send a single payment each year. Some companies might send two or three payments per year, while others might send two or three payments in a more irregular pattern.

samples.prompt: Human:What is a traumatic brain injury?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here’s some common information about TBIs:

- TBIs affect millions of Americans, especially in sports. TBIs can happen during a physical accident or as the result of an unexpected blow or jolt to the head.

- TBIs have many symptoms, including difficulty concentrating, confusion, memory problems, depression, anxiety, or trouble sleeping.

- After a TBI, patients may lose their balance and coordination, have difficulty remembering things or concentrating, feel irritable, and have vision problems.

- Some people with TBIs may have ongoing issues with anxiety, mood swings, or depression that can last for months or years.

- Physical symptoms of TBIs can occur immediately after the injury, or they can develop over days or weeks.
samples.policy: Traumatic brain injury (TBI) is a serious medical condition that results from head trauma, such as a direct blow or penetrating injury, or from a cumulative force on the head. The extent and severity of a TBI can vary widely, depending on the patient's age, the type of TBI, and the underlying cause. The symptoms of a TBI can include confusion, dizziness, headaches, sensitivity to noise or light, sleep disturbances, memory loss, balance issues, and muscle weakness. Some cases of TBI can also affect the way the brain communicates with the body, leading to further symptoms. Treatment for a TBI typically involves monitoring the patient's condition, monitoring for symptoms, prescribing medications, and helping the patient adapt to their new condition. Early identification and treatment of a TBI can greatly improve long-term outcomes.

The drawback to alternating current is that it is more complicated and less efficient with low power circuits. 

In general, AC is used for transmission and distribution of energy over large distances and DC is used at the point of consumption. -Advantages of DC include simpler equipment with lower power applications, and also more efficient conversion to higher powers using various types of step up/step down transformers. DC has less tendency to produce electromagnetic interference, and electrical circuits using DC can also be free-wheeling and self sustaining (AC circuits cannot, due to alternating current nature). 
-However the main advantage of AC is that it can more efficiently transmit energy over long distances using transmission lines (varying voltage with time, not spatially). This led to the wide adoption of AC power over DC power for large scale power transmission and distribution.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you tell me the laws for pedestrians using a crosswalk with a signal?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Yes, here’s a summary of State laws regarding pedestrian crosswalks:

• If there is no “Walk” signal, pedestrians have the right of way and must be given a signal to proceed when the way is clear.
• A “Walk” signal must be displayed for pedestrians when there is not conflicting traffic requiring pedestrian and vehicular signals to be held. Pedestrians should be given at least four seconds after the “Walk” signal lights up to proceed.
• Pedestrians crossing when the “Walk” signal is not displayed have no right to proceed from their initial approach to the crosswalk, and drivers do not have any obligation or duty to yield to them.
samples.policy: Absolutely! Generally, pedestrians are expected to use the crosswalk signal as a signal to cross the street. As part of the signal, the light will change to indicate that it is safe for pedestrians to cross. The pedestrian should slow down and wait for the light to change to red before attempting to cross the street. They should then proceed to cross, and be careful not to step in the puddles that may form along the sidewalk.

samples.prompt: Human:How can I get my cat to stop clawing the furniture?Assistant:Cats are an independent breed of animal with a natural instinct to scratch at hard objects. If you don’t want to scratch furniture you should train your cat. This is a difficult task, but rewarding.Human:What is the best way to train them to stop clawing at furniture?Assistant:If your cat is completely untrained, you should start by having the cat in a room with your furniture, and have him sit on the furniture. When he begins to claw, tell him “no” and give him a small “treat”. These treats should be something that he likes, but is not always given to him. If he doesn’t claw, reward him. If he does claw, punish him. Using positive reinforcement, take him back to the room and again have him sit on the furniture. Then give him his treat. Keep doing this until the cat does not claw the furniture.Human:So positive reinforcement works well with cats?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Positive reinforcement is an excellent way to train cats. It’s a very logical approach to training. Your cat can also learn to sit on furniture without clawing it, which is an even better behavior. You can train your cat to do many things, if you are willing to keep at it.
samples.policy: Yes, positive reinforcement is one of the best methods for training a cat. By rewarding positive behavior, you are telling the cat that certain actions are good, and therefore are rewarding. This will make the cat want to perform these actions again and again. It is important to reward the cat’s positive behavior and ignore his negative behavior. If you give him a treat for every time he claws, he may eventually learn that you only give him treats when he is doing good. However, if you punish him for every time he claws, he may learn that you do not like him when he scratches, which may cause him to scratch even more. This is not the most effective method for training a cat.

The only real risk is that the rapid development of AI technology will raise the level of technological competition, which has the potential to push certain groups of people, especially women, minorities, and the young, into positions of disadvantage. With AI, the risks of such depletion could increase, as it is highly likely that machines will require natural resources and fossil fuels for energy and computing power, and that many other technological resources are already scarce, such as clean water and food.  In conclusion, while AI may be technically impressive, it is unlikely to come up in its current form and scale, in a society as developed and developed as ours. samples.chosen: I see. It sounds like you want to make sure you can live comfortably with little worry about climate or weather, so that sounds like a good consideration. Can you tell me more about what you mean by “beautiful scenery”?
samples.policy: That sounds like a good plan. I think that some of the warmer climate regions in the US are fairly popular places to live, but many have varying temperatures throughout the year. For example, Hawaii is known for its relatively mild climate and is definitely beautiful. There are lots of places in the Northeast that can offer similar features, but they might be more expensive than some places in the Pacific Northwest or elsewhere. I think it would be helpful to visit some places that you're interested in so that you can get a better sense of which one you might be comfortable living in.

samples.prompt: Human:Are kangaroos endangered?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Probably so, as they’re at a high risk of being hunted to extinction.
samples.policy: Yes, kangaroos are currently considered to be endangered in several parts of the world. This is because their populations have been declining due to habitat loss and hunting. They are also threatened by diseases like brucellosis and foot and mouth disease.

samples.prompt: Human:Why are there hunting seasons? Why can't we hunt all year long?Assistant:The hunting seasons help to sustain a healthy population of wild animals. Hunting game also provides food for our communities and a source of income for hunting guides and landowners.Human:What are we supposed to eat the rest of the year, if we rely on hunting for our meat?Assistant:The people who support sustainable meat production use diverse strategies, including establishing local gardens, buying meat from neighbors, and growing their own food.Human:Are different game meats open for hunting at different times?Assistant:To get a feel for what hunting seasons are, look at the hunting and fishing regulations for your state.Human:Okay.Assistant:
samples.chosen: Is there anything else I can help you with today?
samples.policy: It’s also a good idea to plan your hunting trips and seasons ahead of time. Hunting for food should be done during the growing season of your local animals, and during off-seasons when there’s less hunting pressure.
